Translations.Text: When nos dictus to angels, Fall prostrate Adam they fell prostrate Satan. He dictus ego prostrate 1 Vos Shall created mud
He dictus Abinde Vos honored eum me Vos respite me Feria Resurrection ego possess totus his descendants ut few
He dictus Tunc iit; vos those subsequentis vos finis Hell tuus requital; equitable requital
Vos entice them tuus voice mobilize totus tuus forces totus tuus vir them share in their moneta infans promise them! Anything devil promises est non multus than illusion
Prout pro My servus vos non habet power them. Tuus Dominus suffices advocate
Tuus Dominus est Unus causa ships float ocean ut vos seek His bounties! He est Merciful towards vos
Vos afflicted sea vos forget tuus idols sincerely implore Eum alone prout soon prout He saves vos shore vos revert Indeed human est est unappreciative
Vos guaranteed ut He habuit non causa terra shore swallow vos? Alias ut He non send vos tempest tunc vos non invenit protector
Vos guaranteed He habuit non return vos sea alias temporis, tunc send vos storm drowns vos tuus disbelief? Dodum hoc happens nos non dedit vos alias chance
Nos honored infans Adam provisus them rides on terra in sea Nos provisus pro them bonus provisions nos dedit them major advantages than multus de noster creatures
